name: Mobovivo Inc.
description: Second screen apps for TV and film.
overview:
Mobovivo is a white-label Netflix that ‘gamifies’ viewing and connects to the cast, characters and story. Mobovivo’s StayTuned platform is designed to build viewership from pre-release to companion ‘second screen’, to home entertainment.

Mobovivo is a team of former TV producers and talented software engineers that have created the StayTuned platform. StayTuned publishes marketing, companion, and viewing experiences on all devices and computers.

Neilsen’s reports that up to 86% of mobile Internet users access the web and apps while watching TV and 92% of those aged 13-24, are using “second screens” while they watch TV. In addition, 31% of all Internet use and 30% of tablet use takes place in front of the TV. During prime time (8:00 to 10:00 pm), 50% of Americans are using smart phone and tablet apps which has completely overtaken the web (30%) and quickly gaining on TV (63%). This is a significant problem for the TV and film business. Users are being drawn to second screens and engaged in ways that we have never seen. The industry is at risk of losing their audience to email, Facebook and games.   Mobovivo’s white-labeled Netflix solution ‘gamifies’ viewing and connects deeply to the cast, characters and story. StayTuned manages and monetizes the entire life cycle of content and provides new advertising, sponsorship, and transactional revenue. It provides a secure platform that promotes brands while engaging viewers. Our patent-pending technology allows Mobovivo to scale to ensure that every TV show and movie that made it to DVD will also make it to connected TVs, tablets and smart phones.

Mobovivo has released over 100 apps for customers to fill second screens with video using the companies StayTuned platform.

Mobovivo’s innovative Social Video products, Previiw and Social Stream integrate with Facebook and Twitter so that gets our clients video apps discovered.
